Confidential Remarks: This is a trustee sale. Thank you to David Chung and his team, Sunny Kim & Brenda for a professional transaction. David and Sunny took care of their buyers, and Brenda kept us on track with the paperwork. The seller's side was a bit hectic due to trustees/heir dispersed around the state. David and his team worked with and helped with the irregularities and we got the job done. The Wells Fargo lender Satish Dadral, produced the loan without delay and we closed on time.
Public Remarks: Located on a tree-lined street in the desirable neighborhood of Renee Woods, this home features fresh interior paint, hardwood floors, updated flooring, dual pane windows, dining, living and family rooms, wood burning fireplace, built in custom bookshelves, inside laundry nook, abundant storage and an attached two-car garage. The split-level layout creates great separation of the living room to the large family/entertainment room on the other side of the house. Upstairs are 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, each one open and bright. The master or Primary bedroom has 2 closets and the attached bathroom. The large park-like fenced backyard offers endless possibilities for BBQing, gardening, entertaining, or simply relaxing on the large patio. Situated just minutes away from Santana Row, Westfield Valley Fair and downtown Campbell, dining, shopping, and entertainment options are vast and is a short walk to the dog friendly Hamann Park. Commuting is easy access to CA 17 and Hwy 280.

Public Remarks: Move in & enjoy this gorgeous, spacious, single-story rancher in a super convenient location close to Santana Row & Valley Fair. Remodeled in 2007 with many recent updates. Dream-like primary suite has an attached retreat area for office, generous walk in closet & amazing ensuite bathroom with rainfall dual head shower, jetted tub & dual sinks. Inside laundry with extra storage. Awesome backyard with dining patio, turf lawn & gorgeous side yard for outdoor entertainment. Attached 2 car garage plus oversized driveway. Nestled down the street from a lovely park. Conveniently located near shops, restaurants & freeways. Wow.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous single family home with open and bright layout in the heart of West San Jose. Fully renovated in 2022 with permits, the house is updated from the stub with all new plumbing, insulation, AC ductwork, electric rewire, 200amps electric panel and new sheetrock for lever-5 flat walls. Prepare to be captivated by the huge kitchen island with porcelain slab countertops and waterfall, breakfast nook, custom cabinetry and top of line stainless steel appliances. Equipped with a chef's dream array, the kitchen includes 6-burner range top, steam oven, handy pot filler, and an instant hot water dispenser, ensuring both luxury and practicality. Spacious master suite boasting a luxurious en-suite bathroom: double sinks, big shower with tub and a walk-in closet with ample storage. Step outside to discover a meticulously landscaped oasis, complete with artificial grass, mature fruit trees, charming gazebo, mini-golf, water feature and two practical storage sheds. Nestled steps away from lively Santana Row and Valley Fair, and with effortless access to highways 280/880 and prestigious private schools, this house epitomizes convenience and luxury.

This beautiful classic and modern 3-bedrooms, 1.5 baths home with extra-large front and back yards is the perfect place to raise a family or peacefully retire in the center of Silicon Valley. The large laundry area/mud room can serve as storage, artist, or playroom and it links the home and two over-sized car garages. There is also a separate entry for an RV or a basketball hoop. Freshly painted inside-out!

Adjacent to the kitchen, a large bonus area awaits, thoughtfully converted from an outdoor space into an indoor room, and includes a charming brick fireplace. Step out into the backyard where a generously sized deck awaits overlooking a grass area and ample garden space. The property also features a large two-car garage with a convenient permitted (per seller) 1/4 bath inside, providing extra convenience. Additionally, there is an unpermitted (per seller) large bonus space, offering further flexibility and potential. Ideally located near desirable Santana Row.

Every detail has been carefully considered for comfort and convenience. The expansive formal living room and dining room feature recessed lighting and plenty of room for entertaining. The gourmet kitchen with cherry cabinets, granite counters, top-of-the-line JennAir appliances, double-ovens, center island with gas cooktop, instant hot water, huge walk-in pantry, and elegant Crown moulding will impress the most discerning buyer. Bedrooms are bright with spacious closets. The primary bath is updated with double sinks, and granite-top vanity, while the second bath's stunning travertine stone shower adds a touch of opulence. Entire home has dual-paned windows to gaze outside to the meticulously landscaped yard. Paver pathways, patio, and a pergola with retractable cover offer a serene retreat. 2-car garage offers plenty of storage with covered breezeway to front door. Central A/C adds to your comfort. Just blocks from Santana Row, minutes to great schools, parks, Apple Campus, Valley Fair, easy access to Hwys 280/880. You will love this home!

Public Remarks: Price Improvement! Enter this single-level home through a private courtyard and experience the perfect blend of modern updates and practical living spaces. This updated home features a well-designed floor plan and double pane windows flooding the space with light. Additional upgrades include new appliances, AC unit for year-round comfort, a tankless water heater, and a solar system which reduces energy costs. The property offers ample street parking and a designated area for RV or boat storage. The spacious yard, accessible from the living room, is perfect for indoor-outdoor living. It features a combination of flagstone and lush green areas, providing a serene setting for relaxation and entertainment. The patio area is perfect for al fresco dining and hosting gatherings with family and friends. The garage has been thoughtfully converted into a functional office space, which includes a full bath and laundry, with city permits obtained in February 2016, making it an excellent spot for remote work or a creative studio. Situated in a prime location between downtown Campbell and Santana Row/Valley Fair Mall, this home offers convenient access to the 280, 17, and 85 freeways, ensuring easy commutes and proximity to a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options.

Public Remarks: Step through the front door at 896 Greenbay Ct and you can feel the comfort in the air. Maybe its the obvious things like the hardwood floors, the updated kitchen, the updated primary suite, or maybe its just the pool in the backyard that has the you dreaming about your summer afternoons. Either way, this home has all the big and small details that you are looking for. A walk through the home will have you noticing the stainless steel kitchen appliances, the convenient separate laundry room, the large pantry, and the numerous plantation shutters, but after you move in and get settled you will appreciate the often overlooked details like the update furnace, the owned solar electric system, the 220v electric car hookup in the attached garage. This home has been lived in, loved, and cared for in every step of the way. This home exemplifies what a well maintained property should be. Come take a look for yourself and see if you can envision your days and nights here in this lovely home.
